summary: Tough karate master Terry Tsurugi takes it upon himself to protect a late businessman's daughter from the Yakuza.
cast: Shin'ichi Chiba|Yutaka Nakajima|Chiyoko Kazama|Etsuko Shihomi|Goichi Yamada|Nobuo Kawai|Akira Shioji|Chico Lourant|Tony Cetera|Osman Yusuf|Jirô Yabuki|Minken Karasawa|Takuzô Kawatani|Kojiro Shirakawa|Tetsuo Torisu|Hisao Mizoguchi|Masataka Iwao|Takashi Noguchi|Osamu Kaneda|Satoshi Kurihara|Yoshimasa Sato|Jun'ichi Haruta|Tsutomu Sakai|Seizô Fukumoto|Shunji Sasaki|Ryuji Komine|Takaya Shimoyama|Takanori Oya|Ryûji Katagiri|Tetsuo Fujisawa|Ryôzô Maekawa|Yukio Yano|Yasumori Hikita|Gentarô Mori|Shunichi Nagara|Masashi Ishibashi|Shiro Sumitomo|Tsutomu Harada|Ken Kazama|Rin'ichi Yamamoto|Tatsuo Endô|Bin Amatsu|Fumio Watanabe|Masafumi Suzuki
title: The street fighter
